DOC.HEADLINE: THE WEEK AHEAD : OSLO ; IN THE NAME OF PEACE
DOC.TEXT: Israel ' s Prime_Minister Yitzhak Rabin , Foreign Minister Shimon Peres and Palestine Liberation Organization Chairman Yasser Arafat will receive the Nobel Peace Prize on Saturday in the traditional awards ceremony at Oslo ' s city_hall . The three leaders will be honored for their work in fashioning the Israeli-Palestinian peace accord , which despite serious problems in its implementation has laid the basis for ending the Arab-Israeli conflict . Prior to the ceremony , Rabin and Arafat will confer on the difficult steps they must take next in organizing the Palestinians ' first national elections and pulling Israeli forces_out of Palestinian towns and villages in the occupied West_Bank .
